channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FX Bubbles: Through the Lens of Shiller and Sornette
item.description: The theories and models introduced by Robert Shiller and Didier Sornette are as applicable to the foreign exchange market as they are to the stock market.

item.title: Canadian youth have put hockey on thin ice: As participation declines, the future on the beloved pastime is precarious
item.description: Hockey Canada reported a 35% drop in youth hockey participation compared to 13 years ago.

item.title: Book Review: A Wealth of Well-Being
item.description: Finance practitioners can benefit from Meir Statman's challenge to make finance an “afterthought” and spend more time thinking about life well-being.

item.title: 'The world might become stuck in the slow lane'—World Bank warns of the consequences of sustaining elevated interest rates
item.description: "We need to avoid lower-for-longer economic growth around the world," said The World Bank's deputy chief economist Ayhan Kose.

item.title: What’s Your Client’s Optimal Equity Allocation?
item.description: Note to investment advisors: You may be overestimating the risks of equities for conservative investors with longer investment horizons.

item.title: Ambition Mastercard® review: Build credit in college on your terms
item.description: The Ambition Mastercard® is a hybrid secured card with no credit check and a flexible deposit.

item.title: Gold and Inflation: An Unstable Relationship
item.description: While there are periods when gold has hedged inflation quite well, beware blanket claims of gold's inflation-hedging utility.

item.title: No one wants another pandemic—but bird flu has already flown the coop
item.description: The H5N1 virus, also known as bird flu or avian influenza, is surging among mammals and proving itself very versatile at jumping from species to species.

item.title: Monetary Policy and Financial Conditions: Meaningful Relationship?
item.description: An analysis of the Fed's recent rounds of quantitative tightening (QT) and quantitative easing (QE) yields actionable insights about the relationship between monetary policy and financial conditions.

item.title: Hunter Biden convicted of all 3 felony charges in federal gun trial
item.description: President Biden's son was found guilty of lying to a gun dealer, making a false claim on the application, and illegally having the gun for 11 days.
